_meta.description: OpKit Registry - Maps TUPs to their associated OpKits (production support bundles)
notes: OpKits scaffold deliverable creation: Reference Models, Templates, Checklists, Graded Examples
Each TUP may have one or more associated OpKits
OpKits stored in ops_model_v10_dump/ and will be migrated to opkits/ directory
Navigation: Given any TUP code, Claude can locate its OpKit(s)

production.description: For repeatedly created deliverables across multiple Trades
production.example: Strategic Thesis OpKit, Market Landscape Map OpKit

foundation.example: Documentation Standards OpKit, Protocol Creation OpKit

opkits.name: Thesis Structure Checklist
opkits.description: Decision-forcing checklist: 16 required fields across ICP (3), Positioning (3), Product (3), Distribution (2), Finance (2), Kill Criteria (2)

components.downstream_map: ops_model_v10_dump/1205_m0_thesis_downstream.json - shows which clusters consume which thesis fields

opkits.notes: Bootstrap thesis.json fills most fields but scattered. This OpKit provides single unified checklist.

opkits.name: Computational PMF Observer
opkits.description: Composite state estimator: 10 signals → weighted score → PMF assessment (No PMF/Early/Achieved/Strong)

components.signals: 10 PMF signals (Sean Ellis >40%, Retention M2 >40%, Organic >30%, NPS >50, CAC trend, Referral >10%, Explanation <30s, Price sensitivity, Inbound, Time to value <7d)
components.weights: Sean Ellis 25%, Retention 20%, Organic 15%, NPS 15%, CAC Trend 10%, Referral 5%
components.diagnostic_patterns: 5 fault-tree patterns for diagnosing PMF failures

opkits.notes: This is an Observer, not traditional OpKit, but serves similar scaffolding function for PMF assessment

opkits.name: Anti-Goals Boundary Conditions
opkits.description: 8 constraints defining what IonWave is NOT, with specific temptation triggers

components.constraints: 8 anti-goals (e.g., no new flavor until $50K MRR)
components.temptation_triggers: Parameters defining when rule can be broken

opkits.notes: Boundary conditions that define solution space

opkits.name: Bifurcation Points Controller Stack
opkits.description: Controller stack: Early Warning (80% of bifurcation) → Bifurcation (investigate/intervene) → Kill (stop business)

components.severity_levels: Early Warning, Bifurcation, Kill - three severity levels per metric
components.reactive_protocols: Defined responses when metrics cross thresholds

opkits.notes: This is a Controller, not traditional OpKit, but provides scaffolding for monitoring

opkits.name: Competitive Intelligence Protocol
opkits.description: Complete CI workflow with 7 frameworks and graded examples

components.frameworks: Porter's Five Forces, Market Landscape Map, SWOT, Competitor Analysis, etc.
components.graded_examples: Real examples at A/B/C quality levels

opkits.decision: REC-007 (Danilo canon cluster, but Bootstrap CI protocol is superior)
opkits.notes: Bootstrap-created protocol is production-ready and contains worked examples

opkits.name: ICP Analysis Framework
opkits.description: ICP definition framework with segmentation, archetypes, psychographics
opkits.notes: Bootstrap-created framework, validated through persona dialogue

opkits.name: Voice of Customer Collection Protocol
opkits.description: Mom Test-based interview protocol with playbook, script, questions
opkits.notes: Mom Test methodology applied, 31 LMNT quotes at saturation

m18.name: SMS
m18.opkits: TBD - net-new from Danilo, no Bootstrap equivalent

migration_notes.next_phase: As each TUP is migrated, register its associated OpKits from ops_model_v10_dump/
migration_notes.extraction_strategy: OpKits will be extracted from ops_model_v10_dump/ and moved to data/opkits/{tup_id}/ during TUP migration
